text: @KLoeffler @BernieSanders So Bernie's is the problem? Meanwhile you took info from a briefing about the Coronavirus and rather than prepare people to avoid what we're seeing you thought about your self and chose to profit off that information instead. The real problem here are people like you---CLOWN!
